name: B Ok
content: Doin' hella shows for my fans
We kicked through that front door
And always did our own thing
And all I did was make time but
I ain't take enough for myself
Just doin' sh*t for everybody else
I ain't hardly even by myself
'Cause they want me to burn out
Seen the end of this movie
They don't know how it turns out
Say they all gon' still love me if
I don't make another hit song
If I don't take time to embrace it
It's a lot that could go down
Be the one that's holding you down
It but you seem like you love it
I remember all of the subjects
Do the best that I can no matter what
When you said you felt single
I remember like it was yesterday
How the f**k you hold me down
When you ain't take my last name
I tried hard to move past things
Had to make a hard decision let you go
We went to colorado we was
I felt like we were ending
This ain't nowhere close to that
Seen some sh*t you didn't like
Said some sh*t that wasn't facts
Back by puttin' your business out
In the end you made it seem like
I ain't the one who held you down
Okay okay I'm a be okay
Okay okay I'm a be okay
Okay okay I'm a be okay
Okay okay I'm a be okay
The day before my son birthday
The week before my mom birthday
That's the day you passed away
